article_title: ‘Playbook’ and Improved Economy Drive Albertsons Sales
article_text:
Albertsons Cos., which delayed its initial public offering during a tough IPO market, said same-store sales rose about 4.4% on an adjusted basis for its September quarter.

The supermarket operator, releasing financial information in connection with its IPO filing, said it believes “the implementation of our playbook, together with other factors, including improved economic conditions and consumer confidence, were the primary factors”...
